author: DryRun
body:
#### PR description:

Fixes the plotting of HB TDC, which has only 2 bits, not 6 bits as in HE/HF. 

#### PR validation:

Passes runTheMatrix test on Run 3 workflows. Correctly plots HB TDC for MWGR3 data.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27880
title: HCALDQM: HB TDC fix (10_6_X backport)
